name: Shevirath
description:
Shevirath is one of the kingdoms of the world of Idenor. It was born thanks to the collaboration and under the protection of the Zyrule Clan (A clan of Dragons) That's why it's called a Protectorate more than a kingdom. It's one of the few regions where people are free and elect their governors. Also where magic is allowed (while most part of Idenor is banned thanks to the empires grown after the fall of the city and empire of Nhalion)

You can have access to a 8k version at brombdir@gmail.com if you purchase it! And also the full story
